description.translate: No one will ever tell you that	you have pointy bones again.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§2Os du minéral\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Plus personne ne vous dira jamais\"}","{\"text\":\"§7que vous avez les os pointus.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7No one will ever tell you that\"}","{\"text\":\"§7you have pointy bones again.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7DAR§c-1\"}"]}}
